subject: p17770657
Findings: In comparison with study of, there is little overall change in the appearance of the heart and lungs. Continued hyperexpansion without evidence of acute focal pneumonia, though there are atelectatic changes at the left base. There is subcutaneous gas along the chest walls bilaterally that was not appreciated on the prior study. This information was telephoned to the nurse in the ICU taking care of the patient on at 950 upon noticing the abnormality.
